price: Basi tukawatoa katika mabustani na chemchem,
footnotes: Tukawatoa Firauni na askari wake kwenye nchi yao iliyo fanana na mabustani yapitiwayo na mito kati yao, wakaangamia kwa kujitenga kwao na Haki, na kuchochewa kutaka kumfuatia Musa, kama ilivyo kuja katika Aya tatu zilizo tangulia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
